pages.text: $(#ffa500)$(l)Mouse Tweaks$(reset) adds a few handy functions to your mouse that are very helpful when navigating inventories and crafting. The $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/mouse-tweaks)modâ€™s curseforge page$(/l) illustrates them in great detail, so I encourage you to check it out to know more.
